moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: An email method for authentication has been added for ${userEmail}
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 为 ${userEmail} 添加了邮件认证方式
这封邮件在 ${thruDateString} 之前均有效

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: If you didn't request this email, please contact administrator and reset your password.
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 如果你没有申请这封邮件，请和系统管理员联系，重新设置你的账户密码。
